column4: hey, if i want to get cedega/Point2Play how wold i go about that ? =)
it is not free software - it costs money and it is not part of ubuntu there is a build that will work with ubuntu
ok, so i wold look for a .tgz package or another type ?
no idea don't use windows software, so therefore I don't need that stuff, however from being here I find that people use it, that is the full extent of my knowledge of it
